messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] some thoughts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/23/2003 1:01:41 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Me, too, Julie. It s great, isn t it? And it just gets better and better! ~Kelly [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/23/2003 1:01:41 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
mjsolich@... writes:


> When I first subscribed to this list it was because I wanted to find out
> how to encourage and facilitate my kids learning. I saw unschooling only as a
> method of education.
>
> Now I am here to change myself so that my kids can be free and happy. And I
> see unschooling as a way of life.
>
> So much change in 6 short months. I know I have a long way to go but it
> feels good to have started

Me, too, Julie.

It's great, isn't it? And it just gets better and better!

~Kelly

messages.subject: some thoughts
messages.msgSnippet: When I first subscribed to this list it was because I wanted to find out how to encourage and facilitate my kids learning. I saw unschooling only as a method
messages.messageBody:
When I first subscribed to this list it was because I wanted to find out how to encourage and facilitate my kids learning. I saw unschooling only as a method of education.

Now I am here to change myself so that my kids can be free and happy. And I see unschooling as a way of life.

So much change in 6 short months. I know I have a long way to go but it feels good to have started.

Julie



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
